description_html: The Mira XL Table designed by Mac Stopa for Casali is a glass dining table with an organic octagonal shape supported by four polished aluminum legs. The tabletop is made of 12 mm extra-clear tempered glass. The curved geometry of the leg corresponds with the geometry of the tabletop and its rounded corners. The table’s outstanding design, quality materials and craftsmanship are not its only attributes. Thanks to the special connection system, the table’s legs are easily detachable from the glass top making the table easy to move and transport. Made in Italy.
product_name: Mira XL Table by Mac Stopa for Casali
